short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps you bookmark and manage GitHub issues with ease

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GitHub Issue Glance helps you bookmark and manage GitHub issues effortlessly. With this Chrome extension, you can star (bookmark) issues directly from the issue page. Access your starred issues on a dedicated options page, where you can view them in a clean, searchable table. Organize and manage your GitHub issues more effectively, saving time and staying focused on what matters most.

It's free and open-source. Pull requests and new ideas are welcomed!
